SignUpDescription: Aap ke dwaara darj kiya gaya number aap ke Raahi App khaate se link ho jayega aur us pe OTP bheja jayega.
LogInDescription: Apne Raahi App se juda mobile number darj karein.
OtpDescription: Aap ke mobile number par OTP bheja gaya hai.
HomePageDescription: Raahi mein aap ka swagat hai, jo badhti umr ke is safar mein aap ka dost, saathi, aur maargdarshak hai.
LearningJourneyDescription: Chuniye woh vishay jis ke baare mein aap ko jaankaari chahiye. Kuch vishayon ke liye aap ko ek kram me jaana hoga.

spalshImages.Title: Learning Journey
spalshImages.Description: Apne shaareerik, maansik, yaun aur prajanan swasthya ke baare mein jaanein.

spalshImages.Title: Linkages
spalshImages.Description: Career aur sarkaari yojanayon se sambandhit jaankaari.

spalshImages.Title: Newsfeed
spalshImages.Description: Apne jaise yuvaon se prerna lein.

spalshImages.Title: Ask SNEHA
spalshImages.Description: SNEHA se apne prashnon ka uttar payein.
